title: sangIta trimUrtigaLai
sahitya:
sangIta trimUrtigaLaip-paNindu talai vaNanguvOmE mArga


anupallavi

  bangAru kAmAkAi muttukkumaran rAghavanaiyum bhajitta bhAgavadOttamargaL Ana


caraNam    ivargaL avatAram illaiyAnAl Ishvara bhakthi Edu susvara sangeeta
vINA vENu mrdanga nAdam Edu shAstrigaL dIkshitar aiyarvAL enum
